title: Bug 113047: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab
OB: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab.
SR: Bug 113047: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab. Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a new data set without an SQL statement. 2. In the data set editor, go to the data source page and change the data source. 3. The new data source should not have any database/table/column information. Actual result: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab. Close the data set editor and reopen it.
